title: Most popular social network sites in Asian countries in 2013
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Country and Platform, and Number of registered users (in millions) in each Country and Platform on the y axis.
The maximum Number of registered users (in millions) 598.0 is found at Country and Platform China (QZone) and the minimum is found at Sri Lanka (Facebook) where Country and Platform is 1.6.
The highest Country and Platform China (QZone) has 596.4 more Number of registered users (in millions) than the lowest Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of registered users (in millions) for 15 number of Country and Platforms.
The Number of registered users (in millions) is appeared to be the highest at Country and Platform China (QZone) and lowest at Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook).
mid_summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Country and Platform, and Number of registered users (in millions) in each Country and Platform on the y axis.
The maximum Number of registered users (in millions) 598.0 is found at Country and Platform China (QZone) and the minimum is found at Sri Lanka (Facebook) where Country and Platform is 1.6.
The highest Country and Platform China (QZone) has 596.4 more Number of registered users (in millions) than the lowest Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of registered users (in millions) for 15 number of Country and Platforms.
The Number of registered users (in millions) is highest at Country and Platform China (QZone) and lowest at Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook).
There is a difference of 596.4 between the maximum Country and Platform China (QZone) and minimum Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook).

The Country and Platform China (QZone) has the highest Number of registered users (in millions), followed by India (Facebook), and Indonesia (Facebook). Down to the Country and Platform Sri Lanka (Facebook) which is the lowest.
Country and Platform Taiwan (Facebook), and Malaysia (Facebook) share the same value 13.0.
The average Number of registered users (in millions) in all 15 Country and Platforms is 57.96.
Summing up the values of all Country and Platforms, we get total 869.4.
